summary: 2016 JEEP CHEROKEE LIMITED FWD,    MISFIRING AND SHAKING BEGAN WHILE STOPPED AT TRAFFIC LIGHT AND WHILE DRIVING AFTERWARDS FOR 1/2 MILE.  AUTOMATIC START/STOP WAS ON.  PULLED OFF ROAD AND TURNED ENGINE OFF AND LET SET FOR 1-HOUR.  RESTARTED VEHICLE AND BEGAN SHAKING AND MISFIRING AGAIN.  THIS TIME ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON AND START/STOP SYSTEM WARNING CAME ON.  SHUT VEHICLE OFF AGAIN AND LET SIT FOR 30 MINUTES.  STARTED VEHICLE AGAIN AND PUT IN REVERSE, DROVE FOR A FEW MINUTES AND VEHICLE BEGAN SHAKING AND MISFIRING AGAIN WHILE GOING THROUGH THE SHIFTING SEQUENCE.  DROVE IT TO A DEALERSHIP AND IT DID THIS THE ENTIRE WAY, APPROXIMATELY 10 MILES.  NO MATTER WHAT SPEED I WAS DRIVING IT WAS STILL HAPPENING.  THE SHAKING/MISFIRING SEEMED TO SUBSIDE A LITTLE WHEN A/C WAS NOT IN USE.   IN ADDITION TO OTHER WARNING LIGHTS COMING ON, SERVICE-SHIFTER LIGHT CAME ON WHILE MAKING A RIGHT-HAND TURN.
